item.title: Why Scotland and Yorkshire are TV's top UK destinations
item.description: There's been a glut of shows featuring stunning scenery, simple lifestyles and down-to-earth people.

item.title: Rave reviews for Kristen Stewart as Princess Diana in new film Spencer
item.description: The Twilight star "will be instantly and justifiably awards-tipped" for Spencer, some critics say.

item.title: Richard E Grant heartbroken at the death of his wife, Joan Washington
item.description: Actor is heartbroken at the loss of his wife, who was a vocal coach on films including The Witches.

item.title: 'Abba saved 2021' - why the Swedish band have not gone out of fashion
item.description: Forty years after their last album, a new generation of fans is hungry for the pop legends' music.

item.title: Strictly's Ballas lights up Blackpool Illuminations
item.description: Shirley Ballas leads a star-studded line-up to start an extended run for Blackpool's famous lights.

item.title: Drake credits The Beatles on Certified Lover Boy
item.description: Lennon and McCartney get a writing credit on the star's new album, which came out at midnight.

item.title: Dizzee Rascal: Rapper denies headbutting ex-girlfriend
item.description: The rapper, whose real name is Dylan Mills, is due to go on trial in February next year.

item.title: Shang-Chi: Why the MCU's first Asian superhero is empowering change
item.description: Shang-Chi And The Legend Of The Ten Rings sees Simu Liu front an Asian-led cast. Why does it matter?

item.title: Do Abba's new songs live up to their hits?
item.description: The band have released their first new music since 1982 - but is it a hit or a miss?

item.title: Molly-Mae: 'I’m not just an influencer any more'
item.description: The former Love Island contestant is taking on a new job as a creative director in fashion.

item.title: Bristol's Love Saves the Day and Idles attracts crowds of 60,000
item.description: Bristol's Team Love describe the past 18 months as they plan for 60k people on The Downs this weekend.

item.title: Simon Amstell: How the comedian is peeling away the layers of shame
item.description: The stand-up comedian and writer on how telling the truth on-stage and on-screen sets him free.

item.title: Birmingham Hippodrome full audiences 'like coming home'
item.description: Nick Hayes says there is a "huge sense of gratitude" among the cast, who are "so happy" to be back.

item.title: Abba on recording new album Voyage and virtual concerts in London
item.description: The Swedish group unveil their first new music in almost 40 years and shows in London from May 2022.

item.title: Piers Morgan speaks after Ofcom clears ITV over Meghan comments
item.description: Piers Morgan has spoken out after Ofcom cleared ITV over his criticism of Meghan Markle on Good Morning Britain.

item.title: Daniel Mays: Anthony Hopkins 'way off the mark' about drama schools
item.description: Actor Daniel Mays says he "wholeheartedly" disagrees with Anthony Hopkins’ views on drama schools.

item.title: Covid shielder gets private opera performance in back garden
item.description: Ceinwen Giles is shielding from Covid due to her cancer treatment, so an opera was brought to her garden.

item.title: Dave Grohl performs with Nandi Bushell, 11, at Foo Fighters gig
item.description: Nandi Bushell joins the American rock band on stage in Los Angeles.

item.title: Stormzy, Skepta and Aitch: Making beats for rap stars at 19
item.description: Chris Rich has made thousands from creating beats in the style of hip hop's elite.
